<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SuspendCrossingInfo maintains data that allows to answer a question</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whether given two BasicBlocks A and B there is a path from A to B that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passes through a suspend point. Note, SuspendCrossingInfo is invalidated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by changes to the CFG including adding/removing BBs due to its use of BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ptrs in the BlockToIndexMapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SuspendCrossingInfo maintains data that allows to answer a question</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whether given two BasicBlocks A and B there is a path from A to B that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// passes through a suspend point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every basic block &#39;i&#39; it maintains a BlockData that consists of:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Consumes:  a bit vector which contains a set of indices of blocks that can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              reach block &#39;i&#39;. A block can trivially reach itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Kills: a bit vector which contains a set of indices of blocks that can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          reach block &#39;i&#39; but there is a path crossing a suspend point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          not repeating &#39;i&#39; (path to &#39;i&#39; without cycles containing &#39;i&#39;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Suspend: a boolean indicating whether block &#39;i&#39; contains a suspend point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   End: a boolean indicating whether block &#39;i&#39; contains a coro.end intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   KillLoop: There is a path from &#39;i&#39; to &#39;i&#39; not otherwise repeating &#39;i&#39; that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             crosses a suspend point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a602f4157bb9c3e355a0a9377f828a56f">SuspendCrossingInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blocktoindexmapping">BlockToIndexMapping</a> Mapping;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">BlockData &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> Consumes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> Kills;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Suspend = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> KillLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockData, 32&gt;</a> Block;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iterator-range">iterator&#95;range&lt;pred&#95;iterator&gt;</a> predecessors(BlockData </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BD)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = Mapping.indexToBlock(&amp;BD - &amp;Block&#91;0&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acb22fb04083152eee862457e42e8dc31">llvm::predecessors</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if there is a path from \\p From to \\p To crossing a suspend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// point without crossing \\p From a 2nd time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a1b4bc7c3f9aaad9e5b32303bd51081dc">hasPathCrossingSuspendPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;To) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if there is a path from \\p From to \\p To crossing a suspend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// point without crossing \\p From a 2nd time. If \\p From is the same as \\p To</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// this will also check if there is a looping path crossing a suspend point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#ad7b0b1b552021b1e8f080f4e79253853">hasPathOrLoopCrossingSuspendPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;From,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a184a65eb9ac1cd8093ea44d3490b3e70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a184a65eb9ac1cd8093ea44d3490b3e70">isDefinitionAcrossSuspend</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DefBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We rewrote PHINodes, so that only the ones with exactly one incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value need to be analyzed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PN-&gt;getNumIncomingValues() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As a special case, treat uses by an llvm.coro.suspend.retcon or an</span></CodeLine>
